content: Total revenues for the first half of 2022 were $14.2 million versus $10.6 million last year, representing an increase of $3.6 million or 34%. Following a very strong first quarter of 2022, total revenues in the second quarter of 2022 were $4.5 million versus $5.9 million a year ago, representing a decrease of $1.4 million or 24%.
